name: Notion Travel Planner
description: Introducing the Perfect Travel Planner for Your Upcoming Trip!This Notion Travel Planner is designed to make your trip planning process smooth, organized, and enjoyable! Whether you're going on a weekend getaway or a grand adventure, our planner will help you stay on top of all the details and ensure you have an unforgettable journey!Notion Travel Planner (Basic) offers :Accommodation & Transport ManagementAttractions BoardItinerary BoardBudget & Expense ManagementHere's what Notion Trav
features: Accommodation & Transport Management; Attractions Board; Itinerary Board; Budget & Expense Management; Itinerary Planning Board; Easily create a day-by-day itinerary of your trip.; Add activities, attractions, and places you want to visit, and customize the schedule to fit your preferences.; Simple to rearrange plans or add new ones on the go.; Accommodation and Transportation Management; Keep track of your accommodation details, including reservation information, check-in/out times, and contact details.
